extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  A grade of C- in SOCY122/6.0

basic.description: Explores the range of sociological and feminist theories about gender construction and inequity. An integrated study of gender, race, class and sexuality and how these social relations shape women's lives; topics such as the gendered and racialized organization of work, family, popular culture and masculinity are discussed.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Women and Social Structure
